comment.body:
> [binchan2](#comment_1_1AWwhg4EiWAVttfQboJZ4wJfX3WawfJT3h): You may also like to check this enhanced ZeroBlog I made, it supports tags, inserting image and mobile device, based on the blog in your link (from a clone) and a pretty new official Zeroblog :)

Thank you very much. This is just what I was searching for!
